info: The Ford EcoSport (pronounced EE-koh-sport)[1] is a subcompact crossover SUV, originally built in Brazil by Ford Brazil since 2003, at the Camaçari plant. A second generation concept model was launched in 2012, and is also assembled in new factories in India,[2] Thailand, Russia and Romania.[3] The vehicle entered the North American market for the first time in 2018.
